markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shaitan Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2573) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 107 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

The magic of shaitans runs through your blood. You can cast [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136) and [_resist energy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=256) once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.
name: Shaitan Magic
